text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to identify UK civil litigation rules as including proportional pre-trial discovery. CPR Part 31 governs disclosure (discovery) in the UK, and the Civil Procedure Rules (CPR) generally mandate proportionality in disclosure obligations (e.g., CPR 31.5(2) and the overriding objective in CPR 1.1).
